bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign identical with bi nü 鼻衄① . Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry guan zhong 貫眾：取根為末，水 調服一錢匕，止鼻血有效 , “Prepare a powder from its root and ingest, mixedwith water, a spoonful in the quantity of 1 qian . It is effective for stopping nosebleed ”.

② Pathological Condition identical with bi nü 鼻衄② . Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 7: 蘇子降氣湯，治虛壅鼻血 , “The decoction with su zi to bring the qi down cures depletion and obstruction accompanied by nosebleed ”.
